user_input: "TC-001: Testing that BIM  Resources' elements are  working"
retrieved_contexts:
['This test checks if the BIM Resources button functions properly on the Commercial Product Sizing page. The goal is to ensure that the button redirects to the correct BIM Resources page and is accessible.
Given Go to "rheem" website
 When click on the products button
 And click on commercial button
And click on the Project Sizing button
When click on the "BIM Resources" button
Then should be redirected to the "BIM Resources page" page
User should be redirected to the
 “BIM Resources page” upon clicking
 the BIM Resources button.']

user_input: TC-002: Checking valid  Submission Validation  with Pool And Spa
retrieved_contexts:
['This test validates the successful submission of the Pool and Spa contact form with valid input data. The objective is to confirm that the form functions as expected and captures user input correctly.
Given go to the "rheem" Page
And click on the Contact button
And click on the Pool And Spa button
And type the Full Name "<full Name>" on First
And type the Address LineFirst "<address Line1>" on Address first Line box
And type the Address Address secondLine "<address Line2>" on Address second line box
And type the city "<city>" city box
And User select the "<states Province>" on States Provinces Type dropdown
And User selects "<country>" from the Country dropdown
And type the postalCode "<zipcode>" on postalCode box
And type the Company Name "<company Name>" on Company box
And type the Phone "<cell>" on Phone box
And type Email "<email>" on Email box
And User selects "<subtopic>" from the Select Subtopic dropdown
And type the Model Number "<model Number>" on Model Number box
And type the Serial Number"<serial Number>" on Serial Number box
And type the Plumber Name "<plumber Name>" on Plumber Name box
And type the Plumber phone "<plumber Phone>" on Plumber phone box
And type the Comments "<comments>" on Comments box
Then Click the Submit Button Pool And Spa
The user should be able to fill out all required fields with valid data and successfully submit the form. A confirmation or success message should appear, or the user should be redirected to a confirmation page (depending on the application’s design).']

user_input: TC-003: Heating and  Cooling Page - Residential : Text contains the header
retrieved_contexts:
['This test verifies that the header text on the Heating and Cooling Residential page contains the correct content. The objective is to ensure that the header accurately represents the page content and provides a clear understanding of what the user is about to see.
Given go to the "rheem" Page
And click the products
And click the residential
And click the heating and cooling button
Then check text contains the header
The page should display the correct header text ( “Rheem Residential Heating and Cooling Products.”), confirming successful navigation.']

Verify all images on the page are valid (no broken links or missing images)

user_input: TC006: Verifying Privacy Policy Link
retrieved_contexts:
['This test verifies if the Privacy Policy link in the footer correctly opens the Privacy Notice page. The objective is to ensure that users can access the privacy policy and the page loads with the correct information.
Given I am on the Rheem homepage When I scroll to the footer of the page
 And I click on the "Privacy Policy" link
Then the Privacy Notice page should open
And I verify the URL of the opened page
And I verify the presence of the "Privacy Notice" heading and "Rheem Manufacturing Company Privacy Notice" subheading
The Privacy Notice page opens
The URL of the page should be https://www.rheem.com/legal/
The page should display the heading "Privacy Notice" and the subheading "Rheem Manufacturing Company Privacy Notice"']

products/commercial/heating-and-
cooling/"']
